name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Introduction to Fluid Flow
lessons.description: Overview of fluid dynamics and air motion around bodies.

lessons.name: Lift and Drag Forces
lessons.description: Exploring lift and drag generation on airfoils and bodies.

lessons.name: Pressure and Velocity Distribution
lessons.description: Understanding Bernoulli’s principle and pressure variations.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Compressibility Effects
lessons.description: Examining how compressibility impacts airflows at high speeds.

lessons.name: Shock Waves and Expansion Fans
lessons.description: Study of shock waves in supersonic flight and flow expansion.

lessons.name: Mach Number Regimes
lessons.description: Classification and characteristics of subsonic, transonic, and supersonic flows.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Sources of Aerodynamic Heating
lessons.description: Identifying factors contributing to aerodynamic heating in high-speed flight.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer Mechanisms
lessons.description: Understanding conduction, convection, and radiation in aerodynamic contexts.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Study of materials and coatings used to protect aircraft and spacecraft from heat.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Spacecraft Materials
lessons.description: Selection and properties of materials used in spacecraft structures.

lessons.name: Structural Load Analysis
lessons.description: Understanding load distribution and stress management in spacecraft.

lessons.name: Vibration and Fatigue Testing
lessons.description: Testing spacecraft structures for vibration, fatigue, and launch stress tolerance.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Kepler’s Laws of Motion
lessons.description: Understanding the laws governing orbital motion and trajectories.

lessons.name: Orbit Transfers and Maneuvers
lessons.description: Studying Hohmann transfer, inclination changes, and delta-v budgeting.

lessons.name: Re-entry and Decay
lessons.description: Exploring orbital decay, re-entry dynamics, and atmospheric drag.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Power and Communication Systems
lessons.description: Exploring spacecraft power generation, storage, and communication systems.

lessons.name: Thermal Control and Attitude Systems
lessons.description: Managing spacecraft temperature and orientation in orbit.

lessons.name: System Integration and Testing
lessons.description: Integrating and testing subsystems to ensure mission readiness.

name: Structure and Bonding
description: Study of molecular structure, bonding, and electron configuration in organic compounds.

lessons.name: Hybridization and Molecular Geometry
lessons.description: Exploration of sp, sp2, and sp3 hybridization and their effect on molecular shape.

lessons.name: Functional Groups
lessons.description: Overview of major functional groups and their chemical properties.

lessons.name: Resonance and Aromaticity
lessons.description: Understanding delocalized bonding and aromatic stability in molecules.

name: Reaction Mechanisms
description: Detailed study of organic reaction mechanisms and reactivity patterns.

lessons.name: Substitution and Elimination Reactions
lessons.description: Examining SN1, SN2, E1, and E2 mechanisms and their energy profiles.

lessons.name: Addition Reactions
lessons.description: Mechanisms of addition across double and triple bonds.

lessons.name: Reaction Kinetics and Thermodynamics
lessons.description: Studying reaction rates, energy changes, and equilibrium in organic systems.

name: Spectroscopy and Applications
description: Techniques for identifying organic molecules using spectroscopy.

lessons.name: Infrared Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Analyzing molecular vibrations and identifying functional groups using IR.

lessons.name: NMR Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Understanding nuclear magnetic resonance and structure elucidation.

lessons.name: Mass Spectrometry
lessons.description: Determining molecular mass and fragmentation patterns of organic compounds.

name: Atomic and Molecular Structure
description: Study of bonding models, periodic properties, and molecular geometry.

lessons.name: Bonding Theories
lessons.description: Introduction to ionic, covalent, and metallic bonding.

lessons.name: Molecular Geometry
lessons.description: Exploring VSEPR and hybridization in inorganic compounds.

lessons.name: Periodic Trends
lessons.description: Understanding periodic trends in atomic size, ionization energy, and electronegativity.

name: Coordination Chemistry
description: Study of coordination compounds, bonding, and electronic spectra.

lessons.name: Coordination Compounds and Nomenclature
lessons.description: Rules for naming and identifying coordination complexes.

lessons.name: Crystal Field Theory
lessons.description: Explaining splitting of d-orbitals and color in transition metal complexes.

lessons.name: Ligand Field Theory
lessons.description: Advanced understanding of bonding in coordination compounds.

name: Inorganic Applications
description: Real-world applications of inorganic chemistry in materials and catalysis.

lessons.name: Catalysis and Organometallics
lessons.description: Applications of metal complexes in catalytic reactions.

lessons.name: Bioinorganic Chemistry
lessons.description: Study of metal ions in biological systems.

lessons.name: Nanomaterials
lessons.description: Exploration of nanoscale materials and their chemical properties.

name: Thermodynamics and Equilibrium
description: Understanding the laws of thermodynamics and equilibrium processes.

lessons.name: Laws of Thermodynamics
lessons.description: Introduction to the zeroth, first, second, and third laws.

lessons.name: Enthalpy and Entropy
lessons.description: Energy transformations and disorder in chemical systems.

lessons.name: Chemical Equilibrium
lessons.description: Principles of dynamic equilibrium and Le Chatelier’s principle.

name: Quantum Chemistry
description: Application of quantum mechanics to chemical systems.

lessons.name: Wave-Particle Duality
lessons.description: Exploration of dual nature of matter and light.

lessons.name: Schrödinger Equation
lessons.description: Solving quantum mechanical equations for atoms and molecules.

lessons.name: Atomic and Molecular Orbitals
lessons.description: Understanding orbital shapes and energy levels.

name: Kinetics and Reaction Dynamics
description: Study of chemical reaction rates and mechanisms.

lessons.name: Rate Laws and Mechanisms
lessons.description: Determining reaction order and rate constants.

lessons.name: Catalysis and Temperature Dependence
lessons.description: Effect of catalysts and temperature on reaction rates.

lessons.name: Photochemical Reactions
lessons.description: Introduction to light-induced chemical transformations.

name: Introduction to Middle-earth Languages
description: Study of the origin and structure of Elvish, Dwarvish, and Black Speech.

lessons.name: Origins of Elvish and Dwarvish
lessons.description: Exploring the linguistic roots of Sindarin and Khuzdul.

lessons.name: Phonetics and Pronunciation
lessons.description: Understanding sounds and pronunciation rules of Middle-earth languages.

lessons.name: Writing Systems
lessons.description: Study of Tengwar and Cirth scripts used across Middle-earth.

name: Grammar and Syntax
description: Analysis of linguistic structure and syntax in Elvish and Dwarvish.

lessons.name: Sindarin Grammar
lessons.description: Sentence structure and grammar rules in Sindarin language.

lessons.name: Quenya Verb Forms
lessons.description: Understanding verb conjugations and tenses in Quenya.

lessons.name: Khuzdul Lexicon
lessons.description: Exploring Dwarvish vocabulary and morphological structure.

name: Texts and Inscriptions
description: Study of ancient scripts, poetry, and inscriptions from Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Elvish Poetry
lessons.description: Analysis of poetic inscriptions and songs in Elvish languages.

lessons.name: Dwarvish Runes
lessons.description: Translating Khuzdul runes from inscriptions and artifacts.

lessons.name: The Black Speech of Mordor
lessons.description: Deciphering phrases and inscriptions in Sauron’s language.

name: History of Middle-earth Politics
description: Study of alliances, conflicts, and leadership in Middle-earth history.

lessons.name: The First and Second Ages
lessons.description: Overview of major political events in the early Ages of Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Alliances Among Races
lessons.description: Exploring partnerships between Elves, Men, and Dwarves.

lessons.name: Rise of Sauron
lessons.description: Understanding the political and military influence of Sauron.

name: Diplomacy and Conflict Resolution
description: Analysis of negotiation and peace strategies in Middle-earth.

lessons.name: The Council of Elrond
lessons.description: Case study on decision-making and alliance formation.

lessons.name: The Role of Wizards
lessons.description: Examining Gandalf’s diplomatic influence across races.

lessons.name: Treaties and Oaths
lessons.description: Historical examples of treaties and broken oaths in Middle-earth.

name: Post-war Governance
description: Study of leadership and reconstruction after the War of the Ring.

lessons.name: The Reign of King Elessar
lessons.description: Political restructuring under Aragorn’s leadership.

lessons.name: Restoration of Peace
lessons.description: Efforts to rebuild inter-species trust and cooperation.

lessons.name: Legacy of the Third Age
lessons.description: Long-term impact of diplomacy and war outcomes.
